mapper.select: SELECT r.role_id, r.role_name, r.role_desc, r.update_time_ms, r.create_time_ms, ( CASE WHEN rel.authority_count IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE rel.authority_count END ) AS authority_count, ( CASE WHEN a.admin_count IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE a.admin_count END ) AS admin_count FROM oss_role r LEFT JOIN (SELECT role_id, COUNT(*) authority_count FROM oss_rel_role_menu_function GROUP BY role_id) rel ON rel.role_id = r.role_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT role_id, COUNT(*) admin_count FROM oss_admin GROUP BY role_id) a ON a.role_id = r.role_id LIMIT #{start,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}
